document_data.name: ''Mask of the Five Senses''
document_data.location:
[[Sword Mountains]], [[Sword Coast North]]
[[Neverwinter]]
[[Mere of Dead Men]]
[[Illefarn]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Masks of the five senses''''' were a type of [[enchanted]] [[mask (object)|masks]] of unknown origins that were in use in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These masks sharpened senses of the wearer when worn, hence granting them enhanced perception.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''masks of the five senses'' could be found among bandits and heroes of the [[Sword Mountains]], [[Neverwinter]] environs, raiders from the [[Mere of Dead Men]], and among the ruins of [[Illefarn]].
